vampire.config_products.FloodForecastProductImpl module¶

class vampire.config_products.FloodForecastProductImpl.FloodForecastProductImpl(country, product_date, interval, vampire_defaults)[source]¶

Bases: vampire.config_products.RasterProductImpl.RasterProductImpl

Implementation of Flood Area Impact config file process generation.

Implementation class for generating config file entries for Area impact of Flood Forecasting data product.

generate_config(data_dir=None, file_pattern=None, threshold_file=None, threshold_dir=None, threshold_pattern=None, accumulate_days=None, flood_years=None, output_file=None, output_dir=None, output_pattern=None)[source]¶

Generate config file section for generating Flood Forecasts.

Generate config file entries required to create Flood Forecasts for the specified country, date and interval.

Parameters:
  • data_dir (string) – Directory where the GFS files for the product date are located.
  • file_pattern (string) – Regular expression pattern to used to find the GFS file for the product date.
  • threshold_file (string) –
  • threshold_dir (string) –
  • threshold_pattern (string) –
  • accumulate_days (int) – Number of days to forecast for.
  • flood_years (int) –
  • output_file (string) –
  • output_dir (string) – Directory to save the Flood Forecast output files.
  • output_pattern (string) –
Returns:

Config file sections required for generating Flood Forecasts.
Return type:

string
